sense.name: leave undone or leave out
sense.examples: She neglected to say what it was for. They neglected to get our oil supplies and our submarines. They will rue the day they neglected to read my mail.

sense.name: disregard, fail to attend to
sense.examples: He neglected his health for years. He neglects the prayer which is the pillar of religion. I would never neglect my children! If they neglected their duty, they were severely punished.
